title: 107_hr1190
content: Marriage Penalty Relief Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to permit a husband and wife to make a combined return of income taxes under which: (1) a separate taxable income is determined for each spouse by applying the rules provided in this Act. And (2) the tax imposed by section 1 of the Code is the aggregate amount resulting from applying the separate rates set forth in section 1(c) to each such taxable income.
